column4: Will I be able to daul boot Ubuntu and Windows 2000 professional if I have used 28.5 GB out of 145.4 GB?
Will I be able to daul boot Ubuntu and Windows 2000 professional if I have used 28.5 GB out of 145.4 GB?
You will need to use gparted or partition magic from a liveCD to resize your Ubuntu partition and also re-install GRUB after windows as windows clobbers it
